Detailed Description

Manager that handles DzAction objects.

This class manages actions that the user can perform in the interface via pressing a hot key or clicking on a menu/toolbar item. There is only one instance of this manager in an application. This instance is created and owned by DzMainWindow. Don't create an instance of this class, but rather request a pointer to it from DzMainWindow via DzMainWindow::getActionMgr().

See also:
DzAction

Member Function Documentation

bool DzActionMgr::addActionToMenu ( const QString &  className,
QMenu *  menu 
) const

Convenience function for adding the action object of the given type to a popup menu.

Parameters:
className The class name of the action.
menu The menu to add the action to.
Returns:
true if the action was added to the menu, otherwise, false.
Example:
    QMenu           *menu;
    DzMainWindow    *mw = dzApp->getInterface();

    if( mw ) {
        DzActionMgr *mgr = mw->getActionMgr();

        // create a new popupmenu
        menu = new QMenu;

        // add the 'New File' action to the popup menu
        action = mgr->addActionToMenu( "DzNewAction", menu );
    }
bool DzActionMgr::addActionToToolBar ( const QString &  className,
QToolBar *  toolbar 
) const

Convenience function for adding the action object of the given type to a tool bar.

Parameters:
className The class name of the action.
toolbar The toolbar to add the action to.
Returns:
true if the action was added to the tool bar, otherwise, false.
Example:
    QToolBar        *toolbar;
    DzMainWindow    *mw = dzApp->getInterface();

    if( mw ) {
        DzActionMgr *mgr = mw->getActionMgr();

        // create a new popupmenu
        toolbar = new QToolBar;

        // add the 'New File' action to the tool bar
        action = mgr->addActionToToolBar( "DzNewAction", toolbar );
    }
QString DzActionMgr::addCustomAction ( const QString &  text,
const QString &  desc,
const QString &  script,
bool  isFile,
QKeySequence  shortcut,
const QString &  iconFile = QString::null 
)

Adds a custom action to the action manager.

Parameters:
text The text of the action. This is displayed in menus the action is added to unless a different menu text is specified.
desc The description of the action.
script The filename of the script to execute, or the actual text of the script to execute.
isFile If true, then script is assumed to contain a filename, otherwise script is assumed to be the actual script.
shortcut The default keyboard shortcut for the action.
iconFile The path of an image file that will be the icon for the action.
Returns:
The name of the newly created custom action.
QString DzActionMgr::addCustomAction ( const QString &  text,
const QString &  desc,
const QString &  script,
bool  isFile = true,
const QString &  shortcut = QString::null,
const QString &  iconFile = QString::null

desc The description of the action.
script The filename of the script to execute, or the actual text of the script to execute.
isFile If true, then script is assumed to contain a filename, otherwise script is assumed to be the actual script.
shortcut The default keyboard shortcut for the action.
iconFile The path of an image file that will be the icon for the action.
Returns:
The name of the newly created custom action.

DzAction * DzActionMgr::findAction ( const QString &  className  )  const [slot]
Parameters:
className The class name of the action to find.
Returns:
A pointer to the action object of the given class type.
Example:
        DzAction        *action;
        DzMainWindow    *mw = dzApp->getInterface();

        if( mw ) {
            DzActionMgr *mgr = mw->getActionMgr();

            // find the 'New File' action and print its accelerator to the log file.
            action = mgr->findAction( "DzNewAction" );
            if( action )
                dzApp->log( QString( "%1: %2" ).arg( action->text() ).arg( QString( action->shortcut() ) ) );
        }
int DzActionMgr::findCustomAction ( const QString &  name  )  const [slot]
Parameters:
name The name of the custom action to find.
Returns:
The index of the custom action with the given name, -1 if none was found.
DzPersistentMenu * DzActionMgr::findPersistentMenu ( const QString &  className  )  const [slot]
Parameters:
className The class name of the action to find.
Returns:
A pointer to the persistent menu object of the given class type.
DzAction * DzActionMgr::getAction ( int  which  )  const [slot]
Parameters:
which The index of the action to return.
Returns:
A pointer to the given action object.
Example:
        DzMainWindow    *mw = dzApp->getInterface();

        if( mw ) {
            int         i, n;
            DzAction    *action;
            DzActionMgr *mgr = mw->getActionMgr();

            // go through the list of actions, and print their accelerators to the log file
            n = mgr->getNumActions();
            for( i = 0; i < n; i++ ){
                action = mgr->getAction( i );
                dzApp->log( QString( "%1: %2" ).arg( action->text() ).arg( QString( action->shortcut() ) ) );
            }
        }

the currently set active menu or null if none is set

void DzActionMgr::setAccel ( const QString &  className,
QKeySequence  key 
)

Sets the shortcut key for the action object of the given class type.

Parameters:
className The name of the action class to set the accelerator for.
key The keyboard shortcut for the accelerator.
Example:
    DzMainWindow    *mw = dzApp->getInterface();

    if( mw ) {
        DzActionMgr *mgr = mw->getActionMgr();

        // set the accelerator for the 'New File' action to be 'Control+N'
        mgr->setAccel( "DzNewAction", Qt::CTRL + Qt::Key_N );
    }
void DzActionMgr::setAccel ( const QString &  className,
const QString &  key 
) [slot]

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

Parameters:
className The name of the action class to set the accelerator for.
key The string representation of the accelerator.
Example:
        DzMainWindow    *mw = dzApp->getInterface();

        if( mw ) {
            DzActionMgr *mgr = mw->getActionMgr();

            // set the accelerator for the 'New File' action to be 'Control+N'
            mgr->setAccel( "DzNewAction","Ctrl+N" );
        }
void DzActionMgr::setActiveMenu ( DzActionMenu *  menu  )  [slot]

Sets the active menu, so that actions relying on the active menu can get it. This may be called before the menu exec() call to allow context for script actions.

Parameters:
menu to set as the active menu

void DzActionMgr::setCustomActionScript ( int  which,
const QString &  script,
bool  isFile = true 
) [slot]

Sets the script for the custom action at the given index.

Parameters:
which The index of the custom action to set the script for.
script The script to set as the Custom action's script.
isFile If true, script contains the name of a script file that should be loaded, if false, script contains the code for the action's script.

bool  onOff 
) [slot]
Parameters:

) [slot]
Parameters:

void DzActionMgr::unsetAccel ( QKeySequence  key  ) 

Unsets the shortcut key.

Parameters:
key The accelerator to remove from actions in the app.
Example:
        DzMainWindow    *mw = dzApp->getInterface();

        if( mw ) {
            DzActionMgr *mgr = mw->getActionMgr();

            // unset the accelerator for the action using 'Control+N'
            mgr->unsetAccel( Qt::CTRL + Qt::Key_N );
        }
void DzActionMgr::unsetAccel ( const QString &  key  )  [slot]
Parameters:
key The accelerator to remove from actions in the app.

This is an overloaded member function, provided for convenience. It differs from the above function only in what argument(s) it accepts.

Example:
        DzMainWindow    *mw = dzApp->getInterface();

        if( mw ) {
            DzActionMgr *mgr = mw->getActionMgr();

            // unset the accelerator for the action using 'Control+N'
            mgr->unsetAccel( "Ctrl+N" );
        }
